1.content:
You may now choose what story you will take, so have fun in the world of furries.

[Please note that any unwritten chapters marked thusly: "***" are reserved by the author of the chapter you are on]

Story 01: A young human man meets the cast of Fur Piled, Concession, and more.
1.title: DOO EET

choices: Saetto comes out to thank you***
11.content:
hello im marklenthecool or as my freinds call me Rei. this story is a refection in someways of the way i have lived my life. i was home-schooled for most of my life and then thrown into the sea of shit that is my towns school system. im also Bi (get over it) and took year of being in denial before a was comfertable with myself. i also was a troll on the web for years and would bug furrys...... do you know why (close your eyes and take a shot).....................
........
im a furry and proud :)

it was four o'clock Am on a cold night in Angel City .
a lone camaro speed down the pavement black with green trim and underglow. Rrrrrrrrr a loud screech of tires sound as it drifts a corner coming to a stop in a parking space.
"YEEEEEEEEEEEEAAAAFUCKINGHOOOOOOOO" the driver yells steping out in his rocker jacket, shorts, and leather gloves,
getting weird stares of disgust, all because of ignorant people and their need for segrigation between humans and furs.
"last fucking day for stark!" he yells walking into a dennys throwing away a jeagermister bottle.

**person mode activate 01st**

you sit at a booth at the other end of the dennys as the table already filled with furs
"awww man the dude who runs the place is gunna make you do dishes again!!" you hear yelled from another table
"hey big guy Heres a coffie" you hear from next to you from a fur none the less
"my names rose and tell me if you need anything"
"nice to meet you im Rei, as for your other reqest a carrot muffen please and thank you miss" you reply


(this is a view shift to the FurPiled gang. keep in mind there are some changes to the events like the butterfly effect)



"dude if you get held up again i cant give you a ride home" andy said to saetto
"Heres your mints and dont forget your wallet this time" Rose mused
"But i dident pay my bill rose" saetto said
"that nice boy there did" rose said pointing to you as you walk out
11.title: 4 am? YES, Dennys? YES,  onion rings? NOOOO!

info.brief_description: A mashup of ReiStarks WT, Fur-Piled, Exiled to paradice,
